sentences.en: He came upon the hulking redbrick hospital.
sentences.cn: 他偶然发现了这座红砖砌成的森然高耸的医院。

sentences.en: Kesteven Girls Grammar School was an imposing redbrick a hilltop overlooking the centre of the town.
sentences.cn: 凯斯蒂文女子文法学校是一座引人注目的红砖房,座落在山顶上,俯瞰城镇中心.

sentences.en: The large, redbrick vicarage was built in the days of more fecund clergy.
sentences.cn: 那幢牧师住的红砖大屋是个多子女的牧师在职时修建的.
